attributes.action: WE SHOULD FOLLOW THE USA MODEL OF PROMOTING GB
attributes.additional_details: WE SHOULD ADOPT THE USA MODEL OF PROMOTING & REINFORCING OUR COUNTRY'S VALUES AND IDENTITY. HERE WE SHOULD HAVE THE UNION JACK FLAGS & QUEENS PROTRAIT IN ALL PUBLIC BUILDINGS,PLACES OF WORSHIP,CLASS ROOMS WITH AN OATH TO THE QUEEN, THE PLAYING OF THE NATIONAL ANTHEM BEFORE ALL MAJOR SPORTING & MUSIC FESTIVALS ETC. ALSO HAVE A BANK HOLIDAY TO CELEBRATE OUR COUNTRY. SUCH A FRAMEWORK HAS BEEN PROVEN TO CREATE A CENTRAL FOCUS FOR ALL CITIZENS TO MEET AT.
